mapper.select: SELECT p.payment_no AS paymentNo, p.payment_method AS paymentMethod, p.status, p.pay_date AS payDate, p.reg_date AS regDate, p.upd_date AS updDate, p.orders_no AS ordersNo, p.service_date AS serviceDate, o.title AS title FROM payment p JOIN orders o ON p.orders_no = o.orders_no WHERE o.user_no = #{userNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reviews (review_title, review_content, review_reg_date, review_rating, user_no, payment_no, partner_no) VALUES (#{reviewTitle}, #{reviewContent}, NOW(), #{reviewRating}, #{userNo}, #{paymentNo}, #{partnerNo})
